title: Mason Jar Strawberry Shortcakes with Lemon Curd
directions: Combine strawberries, sugar and lemon juice in a bowl. Let macerate (soften) 30 minutes.
Combine heavy cream, sugar and vanilla in a bowl. Whip the cream to soft peaks with an electric mixer.
Stamp out 8 rounds of pound cake the same size as the diameter of mason jar.

To assemble: fit a round of pound cake into the bottom of each mason jar, add a large dollop of lemon curd, cover with a layer of strawberries and then a layer of whipped cream. Continue layering adding another round of pound cake, lemon curd, strawberries and finally whipped cream. Cover with the lid and chill until ready to serve or transport.
ingredients: 1 pint strawberries, hulled and cut into bite-size pieces
1 to 2 tablespoons sugar, or to taste
8 (1/2-inch thick) slices lemon or vanilla pound cake
